title: What's your favorite element in RPGs?
body:
Just because I'm not in a great mood doesn't mean that I'm against starting interesting discussions!

I've done one of these before, but that was a while ago, and I'm curious once again on the perspective of fellow gamers here.

Anyway, please let me know what your favorite element of an RPG is and why. Also, I'm curious as to which elements you look for when searching for an RPG to play. Not elements such as Fire or Water, but elements that make up an RPG. Do you love immersive stories the most? Will amazing characters reel you in? Is it the setting or atmosphere that grips you? Are you searching for the right gameplay? Will a challenging game satisfy you?

Those kinds of things. By all means, please leave your responses and let me know! :P
